== Erwan Briand ==

Currently, I'm student at the university. I'm specialized in economic and social managment.
I'm also programming in Python, PHP and xHTML/CSS during my free time.
I'm the webmaster of CodingTeam, a French-speaking "forge" to manage and programming all free software projets : http://www.codingteam.net ! I'm currently programming a software that allows you to manage all your movies : http://videomanager.codingteam.net ! I'm also working on a few free software project (tagada, zappy...) :)
